org.nosco
Class MirroredDataSource

java.lang.Object
  org.nosco.MirroredDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.sql.Wrapper, javax.sql.CommonDataSource, javax.sql.DataSource
public class MirroredDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.sql.DataSource

This class wraps other javax.sql.DataSource instances. It usually passes through calls to the primary, but if getMirroredConnection() is called a random mirror is used instead.

Author:
Derek Anderson

getMirroredConnection

public java.sql.Connection getMirroredConnection()
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns a connection from a randomly selected mirror.   Feel free to override this method to implement other load balancing stratigies in your own code.

Returns:
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
